posts.post_content:
Today's offering is 10 cards, all SGC 60(5), all priced equally with shipping included.  No family and friends.  Add PP fees 3% for Goods and Services or
send a check or money order.  Relatively prompt shipping upon receipt of funds.

Each card is $188 shipped ($195for PP G & S)
Buy any 3 for $562 shipped ($575 for PP G & S)
Buy any 5 for $900 shipped ($930 for PP G & S)
Buy the remaining 8 cards $1400 ($1450 for PP G & S)
We'll work out the PP depending on the number of cards.

First names of the players in the title correspond to the order of the scans below.
You should be able to determine the backs from the scans.  Ask if needed.

FRILL.        SOLD

Gosh they look nice. Don't they?

Frank- these do indeed look nice! I will buy Gabby Street. PM coming.

 Trent King
Happy to work with REA losers on consolation prizes.;)

Pricing was modified several days ago.  You might want to look again.

I have been known to consider an offer.
